pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Response (Multivariate) Interpretable Machine Learning // Builds and interprets multi-response machine learning models using 'tidymodels' syntax. Users can supply a tidy model, and 'mrIML' automates the process of fitting multiple response models to multivariate data and applying interpretable machine learning techniques across them. For more details see Fountain- Jones (2021) doi:10.1111/1755-0998.13495 and Fountain-Jones et al. (2024) doi:10.22541/au.172676147.77148600/v1.
